languages.text:
"Грозен удар был, но смертных тепло не сразило
Сына мороза Хельвинтра и жажды отмщенья!

"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!
languages.original_text:
"Грозен удар был, но смертных тепло не сразило
Сына мороза Хельвинтра и жажды отмщенья!

traits.locale_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

"Грозен удар был, но смертных тепло не сразило
Сына мороза Хельвинтра и жажды отмщенья!

"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

languages.text:
「その一撃は恐ろしかったが
人間の熱は
ヘルウィンターの息子の冷気と
復讐を渇望する者を
打ち負かせなかった！
languages.original_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

traits.locale_text:
「その一撃は恐ろしかったが
人間の熱は
ヘルウィンターの息子の冷気と
復讐を渇望する者を
打ち負かせなかった！

languages.text:
“这一击勇猛非凡。
但凡人的热量，
终究不能融化，
赫尔之冬的寒霜之子，
以及复仇的渴望！”
languages.original_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

traits.locale_text:
“这一击勇猛非凡。
但凡人的热量，
终究不能融化，
赫尔之冬的寒霜之子，
以及复仇的渴望！”

languages.text:
« Effroyable fut le coup,
mais la chaleur des mortels
ne triompha pas
du fils du givre de l'Hiver Infernal
avide de vengeance ! »
languages.original_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

traits.locale_text:
« Effroyable fut le coup,
mais la chaleur des mortels
ne triompha pas
du fils du givre de l'Hiver Infernal
avide de vengeance ! »

languages.text:
«¡Terrible fue el impacto,
pero el calor de los mortales
el fin no supuso para la bestia,
del Invierno de Hela nacida
y por la venganza consumida!
languages.original_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

traits.locale_text:
«¡Terrible fue el impacto,
pero el calor de los mortales
el fin no supuso para la bestia,
del Invierno de Hela nacida
y por la venganza consumida!

languages.text:
"Furchterregend war der Hieb,
doch die Hitze der Sterblichen
besiegte ihn nicht,
diesen Sohn von Helwinters Frost,
diesen Sinner nach Rache!
languages.original_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

traits.locale_text:
"Furchterregend war der Hieb,
doch die Hitze der Sterblichen
besiegte ihn nicht,
diesen Sohn von Helwinters Frost,
diesen Sinner nach Rache!

languages.text:
"Darbe korkunçtu pek tabii.
Fânilerin sıcaklığı
Alt edemedi maalesef
Ne Acı Kış'ın soğuğunu
Ne de intikam avcısını!
languages.original_text:
"Fearsome was the blow,
but the heat of mortals
did not defeat
that son of Helwinter's frost
and craver of vengeance!

traits.locale_text:
"Darbe korkunçtu pek tabii.
Fânilerin sıcaklığı da
alt edemedi
Acı Kış'ın soğuğunu
ve intikam avcısını!
